Title: Vacation
Overview: Hoping to bring his family closer together and to recreate his childhood vacation for his own kids, a grown up Rusty Griswold takes his wife and their two sons on a cross-country road trip to the coolest theme park in America, Walley World. Needless to say, things don't go quite as planned.
Keywords: route 66, grand canyon, cow, vacation, road trip, sequel, dysfunctional family, family vacation, amusement park, trucker, roller coaster, theme park, airline pilot, bipolar disorder, plano texas
production_companies: New Line Cinema, BenderSpink, David Dobkin Productions
Cast: Ed Helms, Christina Applegate, Skyler Gisondo
